projects.name: OHS PIR Pipeline

projects.description: Determine what a low-deobligated grant looks like

projects.description: Explore what insights can be uncovered in ACF's federal employee viewpoint survey (FEVS) data â€“ tackling 1-2 questions/week.

projects.name: ACF Know Your Customer

projects.name: ORR UC Portal Database Governance MVP
projects.description: Implement a minimum viable product (MVP) of the UAC Portal Oracle database data governance model. This would allow an initial working data governance product to support the UAC Portal data governance activities.

projects.name: ORR UC Portal Database Synthetic Data
projects.description: To have the ability to conduct real testing in non-production environments.  Identify the databases, tables, fields to be de-identify and replace with synthetic data. Perform an automated or programmatic means to replace, containerize, and tag the actual data fields with the synthetic data. Create and maintain iterations of the synthetic data thus allows other database teams and vendors to have the look and feel of the production database for their development and testing needs.

projects.name: ORR UC Portal Database Schema Delta
projects.description: To maintain synchronization of UC Oracle database schemas between environments. Provide guidance to determine the correct schema.  Provide automated monitoring for deviations of schemas.

projects.name: ACF Credal AI Usage Analytics
projects.description: Evaluate Credal AI platform for usage and context metrics with pilot of 100 users

projects.name: OH PIR Cloud Migration
projects.description: Migrate the PIR pipeline to AWS

projects.name: OHSEPR CCDF Service Provider Address Data Aggregation
projects.description: Gather, aggregate, and normalize data about entities that receive CCDF funding through state block grants, with a focus on business names and addresses.

projects.name: ORR UC Database Optimization for Analytics
projects.description: Advise ORR UC data team as they turn their organically-grown analysis datasets that are backing Tableau dashboards into rationalized data sources
